-- Get ENHANCEMENT tasks from processing_queue (created by OCR Agent)
SELECT 
  pq.id as queue_id,
  pq.document_id,
  pq.task_type,
  pq.priority,
  d.original_name,
  d.file_type
FROM processing_queue pq
JOIN documents d ON pq.document_id = d.id
WHERE pq.status = 'pending' 
  AND pq.task_type = 'enhance'
  AND d.status = 'completed'
ORDER BY pq.priority DESC, pq.created_at ASC
LIMIT 1;

-- Mark enhancement task as processing
UPDATE processing_queue 
SET status = 'processing',
    started_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.queue_id }}'::uuid
RETURNING id, document_id;

-- Get chunks that need enhancement for THIS document
SELECT 
  c.id as chunk_id,
  c.document_id,
  c.content,
  c.content_type,
  c.page_number,
  c.chunk_index,
  c.metadata,
  d.original_name
FROM chunks c
JOIN documents d ON c.document_id = d.id
WHERE c.document_id = '{{ $('Get Enhancement Tasks').item.json.document_id }}'::uuid
  AND c.status IN ('processed', 'raw')
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM enhanced_chunks ec 
    WHERE ec.original_chunk_id = c.id
  )
  AND LENGTH(c.content) > 50
ORDER BY c.chunk_index ASC
LIMIT 5;

-- Insert into enhanced_chunks table (NEW STRUCTURE)
INSERT INTO enhanced_chunks (
  document_id,
  original_chunk_id,
  chunk_index,
  enhanced_content,
  original_content,
  categories,
  extracted_metadata,
  detected_references,
  key_topics,
  content_type,
  page_number,
  enhancement_model,
  confidence_score,
  processing_time,
  quality_score,
  manual_review_needed
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.document_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.original_chunk_id }}'::uuid,
  {{ $json.chunk_index }},
  '{{ $json.enhanced_content }}',
  '{{ $json.original_content }}',
  '{{ $json.categories }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.extracted_metadata }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.detected_references }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.key_topics }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.content_type }}',
  {{ $json.page_number }},
  '{{ $json.enhancement_model }}',
  {{ $json.confidence_score }},
  {{ $json.processing_time }},
  {{ $json.quality_score }},
  {{ $json.manual_review_needed }}
)
RETURNING id, confidence_score, quality_score;

-- Check if all chunks for this document are enhanced
WITH document_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(c.id) as total_chunks,
    COUNT(ec.id) as enhanced_chunks
  FROM chunks c
  LEFT JOIN enhanced_chunks ec ON c.id = ec.original_chunk_id
  WHERE c.document_id = '{{ $('Combine Results').item.json.document_id }}'::uuid
    AND c.status NOT IN ('archived', 'deleted')
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN enhanced_chunks >= total_chunks THEN 'completed'
    ELSE 'processing'
  END as task_status,
  total_chunks,
  enhanced_chunks
FROM document_stats;

-- Complete the enhancement task
UPDATE processing_queue 
SET status = '{{ $json.task_status }}',
    completed_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $('Combine Results').item.json.queue_id }}'::uuid
RETURNING id, status;
